subject: Creativity
title: Haruki Murakami: Running and Writing as One Practice
description: A 60-second lesson on Haruki Murakami: Running and Writing as One Practice.

hook.text: Murakami runs 10 km every day and writes for 5-6 hours every morning.

buildup.text: He wakes at 4 AM, writes until 10 AM, runs, then does light tasks. The routine hasn't changed in 30+ years.

discovery.text: He says writing a novel is 'a physical rather than intellectual activity.
